snippet.title: Light ⚡ Nite - Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Light Nite trailer of April 2021. Earn bitcoin and NFTs by playing!

Light Nite is a multiplayer battle-royale with in-game bitcoin rewards. The game right now is in ALPHA stage but you can pay for an early access in order to support development.
https://lightnite.io/ref=slp

Withdraw your balance to your lightning wallet or in +3000 stores worldwide thanks to Bitrefill.

Trade NFTs in the first bitcoin NFT marketplace for gamers.
https://market.elixir.app

Light Nite is a bitcoin game and uses blockchain game technology.
